    • Method Detail

      • doImageReaderOp

        @Nullable
static <R> R doImageReaderOp(ByteSource imageFileData,
                                       java.lang.String fileName,
                                       @Nullable
                                       java.lang.String contentType,
                                       java.util.function.Function<javax.imageio.ImageReader,R> op)
                                throws java.io.IOException
        Do operation on ImageReader for file.
        Type Parameters:
        R - the result type.
        Parameters:
        imageFileData - the image file data.
        fileName - the file name.
        contentType - optional content type.
        op - the operation. Called for each ImageReader that can handle the specified image file.
        Returns:
        the first non-null result.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - on error.

      • getDimension

        @Contract(value="null -> fail")
 @Nullable
public static Dimension getDimension(ByteSource imageFileData,
                                                                                java.lang.String fileName)
                                                                         throws java.io.IOException
        Get the dimension of the specified image file.
        Parameters:
        imageFileData - the image file data.
        fileName - the file name.
        Returns:
        the dimension or null if the resolution of the image could not be determined.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an error occurs reading the image file.

      • getDimension

        @Contract(value="null -> fail")
 @Nullable
public static Dimension getDimension(FileEntity imageFile)
                                                                         throws net.proteusframework.core.lang.ValidationException,
                                                                                java.lang.NullPointerException,
                                                                                java.io.IOException
        Get the dimension of the specified image file. Calls getDimension(imageFile, true)
        Parameters:
        imageFile - the image file.
        Returns:
        the dimension or null if the resolution of the image could not be determined.
        Throws:
        net.proteusframework.core.lang.ValidationException - if the file is not an image.
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if the argument is null.
        java.io.IOException - if an error occurs reading the image file.

      • getDimension

        @Contract(value="null -> fail")
 @Nullable
public static Dimension getDimension(FileEntity imageFile,
                                                                                boolean useMetaDataCache)
                                                                         throws CmsValidationException,
                                                                                java.lang.NullPointerException,
                                                                                java.io.IOException
        Get the dimension of the specified image file.
        Parameters:
        imageFile - the image file.
        useMetaDataCache - flag to use the FileSystemMetaData cache of the dimension data.
        Returns:
        the dimension or null if the resolution of the image could not be determined.
        Throws:
        CmsValidationException - if the file is not an image.
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if the argument is null.
        java.io.IOException - if an error occurs reading the image file.

      • getDimension

        @Contract(value="null -> fail")
 @Nullable
public static Dimension getDimension(org.apache.commons.fileupload.FileItem imageFile)
                                                                         throws java.io.IOException
        Get the dimension of the specified image file.
        Parameters:
        imageFile - the image file.
        Returns:
        the dimension or null if the resolution of the image could not be determined.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an error occurs reading the image file.

      • getResource

        @Nullable
public static FactoryResource getResource(FileEntity imageFile,
                                                    @Nullable
                                                    Dimension dim,
                                                    int maxWidth,
                                                    int maxHeight)
                                             throws CmsValidationException,
                                                    java.lang.NullPointerException,
                                                    java.io.IOException
        Get the image resource. Either maxWidth or maxHeight may be 0 -- not both.
        Parameters:
        imageFile - the image file.
        dim - the image file dimension.
        maxWidth - the max width of the resource.
        maxHeight - the max height of the resource.
        Returns:
        the sized image or null if an image of the specified size could not be created.
        Throws:
        CmsValidationException - if the file is not an image or the dimensions specified are invalid.
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if the argument is null.
        java.io.IOException - if an error occurs reading the image file.

      • getResource

        @Nullable
public static FactoryResource getResource(FileEntity imageFile,
                                                    int maxWidth,
                                                    int maxHeight)
                                             throws CmsValidationException,
                                                    java.lang.NullPointerException,
                                                    java.io.IOException
        Get the image resource. Either maxWidth or maxHeight may be 0 -- not both.
        Parameters:
        imageFile - the image file.
        maxWidth - the max width of the resource.
        maxHeight - the max height of the resource.
        Returns:
        the sized image or null if an image of the specified size could not be created.
        Throws:
        CmsValidationException - if the file is not an image or the dimensions specified are invalid.
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if the argument is null.
        java.io.IOException - if an error occurs reading the image file.

      • getScaledDimension

        public static Dimension getScaledDimension(Dimension original,
                                           int maxWidth,
                                           int maxHeight)
        Get the scaled dimensions.
        Parameters:
        original - the original dimensions.
        maxWidth - the max width or 0.
        maxHeight - the max height or 0.
        Returns:
        the scaled dimensions.

      • isFormatSupportedByImageIO

        @Contract(value="null -> false")
public static boolean isFormatSupportedByImageIO(FileEntity file)
        Check if a file is in a format that is supported by ImageIO based upon matching the content type or testing the actual file contents as a last resort.
        Parameters:
        file - the file
        Returns:
        true if the file is an image in a format that ImageIO can use.
